item.description:
It's time for our June dance, back in Porter Square!

Caller: The fabulous Linda Leslie (one of my favorite callers!)
Music: The driving fiddle of Randy Miller, with Bruce Randall (trombone, whistle, coconuts), Peter Buchak (concertina, accordion, jaw harp), and Julie Vallimont (piano)
Hear sound clips from BIDA dances at http://www.myspace.co...

Contra Dance 7-10pm
Dessert Potluck during the break, bring some tasty goodies!

All are welcome, all dances taught. Bring a pair of non-street shoes for dancing.


Public Transportation (strongly recommended)
The Masonic Temple is a very short walk from the Porter Square T Station.

Parking:
There is some street parking nearby, with no parking permit needed on Sundays.
Parking meters are not active on Sundays.
If coming from out of town, parking at Alewife or Davis Square and taking the subway may be the best option.

Cost: $10 (Cash Only)

*This is a joint event, please RSVP with one of the groups.
item.name: Contra Dance - Night of Mayhem
